ratings.comment: Went into this class not caring about philosophy at all, but this class quickly grew to be my favorite one this semester (helps that I loved my classmates as well). Class is very reading-heavy, some of which are hard, but since class discussions are centered around the readings, he ensures you understand and know the material. Recommend!!

The course started off well with clear expectations. Instructor was fair, but things became challenging when we reached the writing assignments. First two writing assignments make up most of your grade. If you struggle with one, it's hard to recover. No extra credit and assignment instructions were unclear, which added to the difficulty.
